s.text: Two years ago, before the presidential election campaign, I met him coming out of the drugstore and used the occasion to advise him that cutting taxes was not a winning issue.
When I come out of my apartment I usually see a group of photographers waiting near the entrance to Watergate South, hoping to get a glimpse of her.
I live in the East building of the Watergate complex, and she lives in the South building.
, and the president before it hit the headlines from what happened afterward.
What we have to ask, however, is whether that was a bad thing.
